comments: Great teacher. Awesome in lectures and with practical skills. Very successful in incorporating what will be done in the field with what we see in the classroom.

Glenn is one of the instructors in the Paramedic Program. When lecturing, he illustrates the often dry material of the textbook with actual calls taken from his decades of experience as a 911 NYC Paramedic. Glenn is upbeat, accessible, and helpful - but you better know your stuff!
Glenn is the man, its worthwhile to go to st johns paramedic program just to have him as your instructor. He\'s genuine and actually cares for each individual students needs.
